data.previous: 兔子葡萄挂人被他骗吗？

stories.title: Aesop and the Wrestler(摔跤手)
stories.moral: Don’t be proud(骄傲的) of your natural abilities, be proud(骄傲的) of what you do with them.
content: Aesop was talking to the winner(胜者) of a Greek(希腊) wrestling competition(比赛).
“Congratulations(祝贺) on your win(胜利)!” he said.
